page.title: 13A SCHOOL DAY AT HASSENBROOK
page.content: My day usually starts at 7.15.I have to get ready so that I have time to meet my friends and get to school by 8.50.For the first half-hour we are with our form tutor who takes the register.We then go on to lessons, which are mostly arranged in one hour blocks.After the first lesson there is a 15 minute break.The second lesson finishes at 11.45 when there is a lunch break.I eat my packed lunch in the Junior Dining Room.If the weather is nice I may go into Stanford with my friends.Afternoon Registration at 1.05 lasts for 10 minutes.I then have two more lessons,separated by another 15 minute break.My subjects include English,Maths,Geography,History,R.E., Music and French.At the end of school at 3.40 I play with my friends before going home to do my homework.I then watch television before bedtime.
